text: All I want is for everyone to let me die alreadySeriously  I can t stand living anymore  I m weak and I can t do it  why do I have to justify myself any further I know suicide is selfish and everyone ALWAYS says that but that info doesn t even mean anything  It just makes me feel bad for being  selfish  which makes me more suicidal  I can slowly drift away from everyone if I want to and that s actually fine as long as I seem like I m okay  It s okay to be a loner BUT if I just off myself suddenly it s a big deal  No one actually cares unless you re dead  No one actually cares and then they mourn when you die or whatever  But they didn t fucking mourn or even fucking help me when I was alive so what the HELL do you want me to do  If I m depressed then no one cares  But if I kill myself suddenly everyone is going to care   Even if I seek help  dw am going to a psychiatrist  or let my feelings out people are just going to think I m annoying  So I keep it in and then kill myself and then suddenly it s not okay People just say that suicide is selfish but the question is do they even try to help the people around them who are suicidal  Because if they don t  then they are the ones who are selfish  right All I know is I m annoying everyone by being like this  I don t actually make a difference to anyone s life but when I m missing there s a difference apparently   And it s because we all need each other  but that s not really true  We just need each other s company  That s it  Like i can just get replaced and boom problem solved   The amount of friends I ve drifted from is insane  They don t care about it  They are functioning without me  But if I m not on this earth there is NO difference because they were not talking to me anyway  They can function without me  It s not hard People only care because death is  tragic  Let let me die  seriously
